title: Rob van Bakel - Web Development Portfolio

text.lead: Easily manage your employees and publish work schedules.
text.intro: Spark aims to make it easy for employers to manage their staff, as well as create and share work schedules with their employees. Weekly schedules can be made in the app, which are then being pushed to a calendar feed that employees can subscribe to.

text.lead: Collect links to all your channels in your own custom page.
text.intro: AllLinks lets users create their own page to display links to all their (social) channels, pages and websites across the internet. Users can customize their profile to create one link that can easily be shared anywhere.

text.lead: Put your work schedule in your calendar. Quick and hassle-free.
text.intro: At a former employer, our weekly work schedule was sent to us in a Slack message. As shift times could vary greatly from day to day, copying these dates into your calendar was prone to user error. To simplify the lives of my colleagues and myself, I set out to solve this problem.

footer.title: Contact Me
footer.intro: Would you like to collaborate? Get in touch with me via mail, WhatsApp or the contact form!
